content.p: Welcome to UoN Sustainable Labs Laboratories are some of the most resource-intensive places at the university. But all lab users can take positive actions to reduce the environmental impact of their work. The information on these pages will help you to… Make a change and a make a difference. If you have any suggestions or comments, email sustainability@nottingham.ac.uk and include ‘lab’ to make sure it is directed to the correct person. Coming soon Estate Office, University Park, Nottingham, NG7 2RD Email: sustainability@nottingham.ac.uk
